ts:annotation.ts:documentation: The entire contents of this directory and all its sub-directories are © copyright World Wide Web Consortium 2006, 2007, and are made available under the terms of the W3C DOCUMENT NOTICE AND LICENSE, available online at http://www.w3.org/Consortium/Legal/copyright-documents-19990405.html.
The first testSet was contributed by NIST in 2004. It was published in the previous release of the suite, and is included here unchanged.
The second testSet is an updated and extended version of one originally contributed by Sun in 2004.
The next twelve testSets were all contributed by Sun in 2006.
The next 17 testSets were contributed by Microsoft in 2006. They supersede and significantly extend the Microsoft contribution of 2004.
A further test set was contributed by Boeing in 2007.
The XSD 1.1 tests in the saxonMeta and saxonData directories were submitted by Saxonica Limited during 2010.
The XSD 1.1 tests in the ibmMeta and ibmData directories were submitted by IBM during 2010.
